function.name: dressing_startCourse
function.description: This function is used to start a clothing management course on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to start the course.

predefinedMode.description: The predefined mode to start (e.g., standard, rapid, sterilization, fine dust).

mode.description: The mode to start (e.g., standard, rapid, sterilization, fine dust).
